activation.reactionTrigger: When an attack would hit you or you miss a Dexterity saving throw

system.description: When an attack would hit you, you can use your reaction to roll [[/r 1d4]] and add it to your AC against that attack. Alternately, when you would fail a Dexterity saving throw , you can use your reaction to roll 1d4 and add it to your saving throw. In either case, you know how much the roll succeeded or failed by before deciding whether to use this aegis.
